org.kiji.schema
Class KijiCellEncoder

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.KijiCellEncoder

public class KijiCellEncoder
extends Object

Serializes a KijiCell. A Kiji cell is encoded as an Extension record, although this class implements the encoder in a specific way for efficiency.

Constructor Summary
KijiCellEncoder(KijiSchemaTable schemaTable)
          Creates a new KijiCellEncoder instance.
 
Method Summary
 byte[] encode(KijiCell<?> cell, KijiCellFormat format)
          Encodes a kiji cell to bytes that can be later decoded with a KijiCellDecoder.
 void encode(KijiCell<?> cell, OutputStream out, KijiCellFormat format)
          Encodes a kiji cell to an output stream that can be later decoded with a KijiCellDecoder.

Method Detail

encode

public void encode(KijiCell<?> cell,
                   OutputStream out,
                   KijiCellFormat format)
            throws IOException
Encodes a kiji cell to an output stream that can be later decoded with a KijiCellDecoder.

Parameters:
cell - The Kiji cell data to encode.
out - The output stream to write the encoded data to.
format - Cell encoding format.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error.

encode

public byte[] encode(KijiCell<?> cell,
                     KijiCellFormat format)
              throws IOException
Encodes a kiji cell to bytes that can be later decoded with a KijiCellDecoder.

Parameters:
cell - The Kiji cell data to encode.
format - Cell encoding format.
Returns:
The encoded bytes, ready to be stored in an HBase table cell.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error.
